mods.abstract: Photograph showing a "Joint Exhibit from Louisiana State University, State Experiment Stations, Department of Conservation, Department of Agriculture and Immigration" Louisiana State Fair exhibit featuring rice, yams, corn and sugar (with a taxidermy pelican).
